title: Yoshinaga-sanchi no Gargoyle (Gargoyle of Yoshinaga House)
synopsis: When Yoshinaga Futaba wins the first prize in a lottery, the prize turns out to be a stone gargoyle. More surprising yet, the gargoyle turns out to be alive.
